Testimonials

  • bowman educational services, inc. has been a fantastic resource in meeting the educational needs of our two children. Fran Bowman has helped with every aspect of their education from finding schools and tutors for our dyslexic daughter, to helping with educational testing and tutoring help for our son. Fran's support and wise guidance has made a huge difference in their lives.

    -A.B. and L.B., Parents
